# Contact

<form action="https://formspree.io/f/xyzgvovj" method="POST">
  <!-- Sender's Name -->
  <p>
    <label for="name">Name:</label>
    <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required placeholder="Your Name">
  </p>

  <!-- Sender's Email -->
  <p>
    <label for="email">Email:</label>
    <input type="email" id="email" name="_replyto" required placeholder="Your Email">
  </p>

  <!-- Subject -->
  <p>
    <label for="subject">Subject:</label>
    <input type="text" id="subject" name="subject" required placeholder="Subject">
  </p>

  <!-- Message -->
  <p>
    <label for="message">Message:</label>
    <textarea id="message" name="message" required placeholder="Your Message" rows="5"></textarea>
  </p>

  <!-- Custom Subject -->
  <input type="hidden" name="_subject" value="New message from {{name}}">

  <!-- Submit Button -->
  <p>
    <button type="submit">Send Message</button>
  </p>
</form>
